To me this movie sums up NYC more than all Woody Allen movies combined.

Great movie but there's a STARZ HD logo that comes and goes throughout the movie.  It's a translucent logo and it's only visible part of the time, so it's not TOO bad, but it's somewhat annoying if you don't want any logos taking away from your movies.  Other than that it's a perfect rip.
